tool_description: An extremely easy to use API for creating complex learning chat bots. Bots, or "Minds", start life with their own name, the user's name, and nothing else. From user input, they learn words and their context, so think of it like teaching a child to speak.
name: CognitionLab
title: CognitionLab

api_list.name: /{mind-id}/nuke
api_list.description: Delete your mind's concept network and start it again from scratch.

required_parameters.name: mind-id
required_parameters.description: The unique string you chose to identify the mind with.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mind.p.rapidapi.com/Mind1/nuke"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mind.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mind.p.rapidapi.com/{mind_id}/nuke"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mind.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /{mind-id}/{mind-name}/{user-name}/{message}
api_list.description: Used to send a message to a bot, or just to create a new one. Params are: a unique ID for the bot, or "mind" (can be anything, an ID always returns the same mind), the name of the mind (can be changed as often as desired), the name of the person interacting with the mind (can be changed as often as desired), and the message to send to the mind.

required_parameters.name: mind-id
required_parameters.description: A unique string to identify the mind, like an account username for the bot. (Note when choosing: "Mind", "mind", "Mind1", and "mind1" all return your default mind.)

required_parameters.name: mind-name
required_parameters.description: Name the mind should go by

required_parameters.name: message
required_parameters.description: Message to the mind. If you have never used a mind-id before, the first message will also trigger the creation of the mind.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mind.p.rapidapi.com/Mind1/Mind/User/Hi%20Mind"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mind.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mind.p.rapidapi.com/{mind_id}/{mind_name}/{user_name}/{message}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mind.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
